input.repo_snapshot_md:
# MOVA Skills Lab (2025-12-10)

- Red core: `core/mova` MOVA 4.0.0 contracts (unchanged).
- Yellow layer: infra skills validated via npm test.
- Green layer: lab workflow schemas/envelopes (WF_LAB_01), baseline/candidate artifacts for WF-EX-001 through WF_LAB_04 with snapshots.
- Goal: add Codex-only candidate workflow, record run data + run envelope, produce baseline vs codex experiment result, validate via mova_check_basic, snapshot WF_LAB_05.
